condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Communications, advocacy and partnerships

description.narrative: The CO used key moments including immunization week, the local elections, Parenting Month, UNICEF 75 and advocacy events including a local Youth Climate Summit ahead of COP26, World Children’s Day, Child Poverty Policy Forum and events to launch of new evidence on the impact of COVID on children and evidence on experience and attitudes towards distance learning to build support for maintaining access to routine immunization, education, and parenting support services, and promote youth led climate action and support for mental health.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:21/01/2022
